languages.text: "Как прикажете, Лорд-капитан. Я буду ждать вас на мостике".

traits.locale_text: "Как прикажете, Лорд-капитан. Я буду ждать вас на мостике".

languages.text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."
languages.original_text: "Как прикажете, Лорд-капитан. Я буду ждать вас на мостике".

traits.locale_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."
"As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

"As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."
"As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンの仰せの通りに。ブリッジでお待ちしております」
languages.original_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンの仰せの通りに。ブリッジでお待ちしております」

languages.text: "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan. Köprüde sizi bekliyor olacağım."
languages.original_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Emredersiniz Lord Kaptan. Köprüde sizi bekliyor olacağım."

languages.text: «Como ordene, Lord Capitán. Le esperaré en el puente».
languages.original_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Como ordene, Lord Capitán. Le esperaré en el puente».

languages.text: “遵命，舰长大人，我会在舰桥上等您。”
languages.original_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: “遵命，舰长大人，我会在舰桥上等您。”

languages.text: « Entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous attendrai sur la passerelle. »
languages.original_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Entendu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je vous attendrai sur la passerelle. »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, Lord Captain. Ich werde auf der Brücke auf Euch warten."
languages.original_text: "As you command, Lord Captain. I'll be waiting for you on the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr befehlt, Lord Captain. Ich werde auf der Brücke auf Euch warten."
